original_text: The tribe of Dan must be on the north side of the Tent. They must have their flag with them and they must live in groups. The leader of the tribe of Dan is Ahiezer, the son of Ammishaddai.
korean_text: 북쪽에는 단 군대 진영의 군기가 있을 것이라 단 자손의 지휘관은 암미삿대의 아들 아히에셀이요

sentences.original_text: The tribe of Dan must be on the north side
They must have their flag with them
and they must live in groups
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 무리를 지어 살아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: The leader of the tribe of Dan is Ahiezer
